mapper.select: SELECT aa.[人员编码] staffCode, aa.[姓名] staffName, aa.[部门] department, aa.[事业部] division, aa.[岗位] jobs, aa.[登录密码] staffPwd, aa.[数据级别] Datalevel, bb.[手机号码] phoneNumber, bb.[微信号码] microNumber from PUBLICDATA.dbo.DS_STAFF aa LEFT JOIN Test_jxy.dbo.STAFF_USER bb ON aa.[人员编码]=bb.[人员编码] WHERE aa.[人员编码]=#{staffCode} AND [登录密码]=#{staffPwd}
